name: Echo Control
description:
8-Bit turn based Puzzle/Plataformer game where you control a little robot trying to escape a factory. 

Each level the robot must have every input necessary to progress before actually starting to move.

The game was made for Game Maker's Toolkit game jam with the theme Out of Control. Enjoy the game and we will update it soon with more levels and a few tweaks (like a save file and locked levels).
